favourite.article: The joy in the Lord is a cure to our weary heart. Joy is a virtue rendered into us by the indwelling Spirit. I enjoy Rom. 14:17 "For the kingdom of God is not the food and drink but the righteousness peace and joy in the holy Spirit." Rejoice in Him always.
"However do not rejoice in this, that the spirits are subject to you, but rejoice that your names are recorded in the heavens." (Luke 10:20, RcV) Lord Jesus, may we rejoice in You always. Amen.
